wireframe:
WEBSITE WIREFRAME
==================

Section 1: HERO
========================================
Layout: split-50-50
Components: problem-statement, solution, headline, cta-primary
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: split
  Desktop: split-50-50
Spacing: large

Section 2: SOCIAL-PROOF
========================================
Layout: horizontal-scroll
Components: client-logos, trust-badges
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: vertical
  Tablet: horizontal-scroll
  Desktop: horizontal-scroll
Spacing: small

Section 3: FEATURES
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: feature-cards, icons, headings, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: medium

Section 4: FEATURES-DETAILED
========================================
Layout: alternating-blocks
Components: detailed-features, screenshots, headings, descriptions
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: alternating-blocks
  Desktop: alternating-blocks
Spacing: large

Section 5: DEMO
========================================
Layout: full-width
Components: product-screenshots, demo-video, interactive-demo
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: full-width
  Desktop: full-width
Spacing: large

Section 6: TESTIMONIALS
========================================
Layout: carousel
Components: testimonial-cards, quotes, photos, names
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: carousel
  Desktop: carousel
Spacing: large

Section 7: PRICING
========================================
Layout: grid-3-column
Components: pricing-tiers, features, cta
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: 1-column
  Tablet: 2-column
  Desktop: grid-3-column
Spacing: large

Section 8: CTA
========================================
Layout: centered
Components: headline, subheadline, cta-primary
Breakpoints:
  Mobile: stacked
  Tablet: centered
  Desktop: centered
Spacing: large
